scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall]  Baremetal  Cisco ASA firewall  Planned Service End of Life

incident_updates.body:
95% of Cisco ASA firewall have been deactivated.
Maintenance is still is progress for the remaining ones.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service. OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you wont be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date. Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date. --------------------------------------------------- Heure de dbut : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prvoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont prcdemment souscrit ce service. OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter votre pare-feu Cisco ASA partir de cette date. Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropries de vos donnes avant cette date.
The maintenance is completed, we keep the task in monitoring to validate the maintenance.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 23/08/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 30/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : Slowdowns (a few seconds) may be observed during the deployment on your specific server. Service improvement : Following the incident that occurred during the maintenance in https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/c205tcjnl5q4, we've rollback the change and we are now ready to plan a new deployment.
